title: Shark Red Snow Shovel
description: Tear up hard packed snow and ice build-up with the Shark Snow Shovel. The lightweight and easy to use shovel leaves driveways and walkways clear and safe while eliminating the need for damaging and environmentally hazardous chemicals. Tackle any kind of snow with the 2-in-1 blade design. The smooth blade and scoop is perfect for soft powder, while the shark tooth blade tears up hard packed snow and ice. The patented dual positive-lock swivel head makes it easy to switch between the 2 shovel blades and the 2-part handle allows for compact storage in the off season. 1-year warranty against manufacturer defect. Made with a fiberglass shaft, molded plastic D-handle and ABS high-impact blade.
